name: MCF Return to Ravenhearst Full
description:
Emma's soul is free. But her ghost has delivered a dire warning: evil still lurks in Ravenhearst Manor. Big Fish Games Studios takes you deep inside the cursed estate in Mystery Case Files: Return to Ravenhearst ™, the thrilling sequel. Experience Ravenhearst`s spectral halls as never before with new immersive adventure-style gameplay and an epic original soundtrack. Feel the floorboards creak as you move from room to room solving puzzles and seeking out clues in over 150 detailed scenes.

☆☆☆☆☆ Features ☆☆☆☆☆

✓ Search spectral scenes to reveal the truth!
✓ Find secrets at every turn
✓ An engrossing story puts you on the edge of your seat!
✓ Free the manor's shackled souls!

☆☆☆ Discover more from Big Fish Games! ☆☆☆

Big Fish is the leading global marketplace to discover and enjoy casual games. You can enjoy our virtually endless selection of games anytime, anywhere — on your PC, Mac, mobile phone, or tablet. Learn more at bigfishgames.com!

We have many other great Google Play games available. Just type in 'Big Fish Games' for more fun and adventure!
